topic.title: “War is peace.  Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.”
topic.body:
Justice protects corrupt governments, which approve laws written by corporations and the media (news, movies, series, social media, search engines) create the necessary "reality" inside the matrix, that give us a (false) sense of equality,  justice and freedom, something that never existed in mankind
I hope zero net succeeds, but some (mostly sick people)  will use it for less desirable things and the "system" will try to associate it with terrorism, child porn, etc...business as usual.

“Strange times are these in which we live when old and young are taught falsehoods in school. And the person that dares to tell the truth is called at once a lunatic and fool”

Plato words have +3000 years, but are still valid today, where totalitarianism has (more than ever) the necessary tools to feed the world population with the realities they consider fit, I call it the "empire updates". They come in many forms and shapes,  like search results, nobel prizes, featured books on amazon, Oscars or on a Disney movie.

fb/yt/goog/msft/aapl algorithms are totally biased and they spread mostly climate change, pro gay (I guess the world has too many people and gays cannot procreate) and anti Muslim/Russian/Chinese ( threats to westerns corporations) propaganda.  Anything that goes against their agenda is either censored, discredited or will appear on the 50th page of the search results...

A word of advice, keep your mind free and healthy. No drugs of any kind.  Women are easier to brainwash than man and since the french "sexual revolution", the system uses them as "consumer monkeys" (disguised as freedom) and men, the dumb ones, work like crazy to afford a "beautiful" one  ( or should I say a fake one? fake nails, fake hair, fake boobs, fake lips, you name it). Never give a women too much attention or do what they want if it's not reasonable, remember, you're a men, act like one. Be fair and honest and don't let the system tell you the opposite, these qualities are inherent to human beings and the system spend millions trying to scare you and convincing you of the opposite, they basically want to divide us as much as they can (I, I , I , I...), like Napoleon used to say, "divide to conquer".

My mother language is Portuguese and I try to express myself the best I can in English. Please apologize for any errors my text may have.

Fica bem meu irmão.


Georges Orwell 1984 in different formats (please seed) : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/16cMkqz45EzZSjYqk37UTVXaYqLLtrXf3r/George%20Orwell%20-%201984%20(Novel,%20English)%20_formats_epub_mobi_pdf_abbyy_txt_daisy.zip

1565346520_1CN9rdrWkKbk8EmDSQNZZrwGmd8Tv.body:
Most of the edits on Wikipedia are made by corporations and governments. Here's an example : 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Congressional_staff_edits_to_Wikipedia

Your line of thought doesn't make too much sense to me. 
You want to help spreading millions of censored articles? or do you plan to re-edit them yourself? 

Wikipedia is ok for simple things, but for controversial articles is totally biased. They're part of the same system that made us switch to zeronet, so NO, I don't want to spread whatever bullshit they've on their website. If you suggest creating a new Wikipedia with ALL points of view and without censorship, I'm in and may help, otherwise NO, Fuck WIKIPEDIA.


The biggest donations to Wikimedia Foundation come from rich jewish corporations...
Try editing the 911 or holocaust pages with  "conspiracy theories"  and you'll will see the "freedom of speech" you have there.

https://annual.wikimedia.org/2017/donors.html
http://mywikibiz.com/Top_10_Reasons_Not_to_Donate_to_Wikipedia
http://wikipediocracy.com/

The dumps (they got the name right) are at : https://dumps.wikimedia.org/

1565427459_1w9czsVapAVmVVQzf7xzuSqvqGar6.body: Allegations of Binance Exchange KYC hack. If proved, one more reason to ALWAYS  send KYC documents watermarked with the destination name, if leaked, at least you know where the leak was. The same principle applies to website registrations. I normally use an individual email with custom ID for each website. That's how I knew about Dropbox hack in 2012, way before it was disclosed to public.
